reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress elegant, well-made, and comfortable, with one noting it doesn't wrinkle all night. The material receives positive feedback for its scrunch fabric and shiny texture, while customers appreciate its flattering design that accentuates the waistline. The color is vibrant, with one customer describing it as bright green. Regarding size, while some find it true to size, others mention it runs small. items.author: Laura Hendrix

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfect!
items.body: The Womens Sexy Ruffle Elegant Bridesmaid Formal Evening Dress is a stunning choice for any formal occasion, especially for bridesmaids looking to make a lasting impression. This dress features a sophisticated ruffle detail that adds a touch of romantic flair, while its elegant design highlights and flatters curvy figures. The fabric is high-quality, providing both comfort and durability for long events. The fit is true to size, ensuring that it accentuates the body's natural curves without feeling restrictive. Whether you're walking down the aisle or attending an evening gala, this dress combines elegance and sexiness in perfect harmony, making it a must-have addition to any formal wardrobe. Overall, it's a beautifully crafted piece that promises to make any wearer feel confident and glamorous. Read more
items.author: Nancy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Itâ€™s sexy and silky!!
items.body: Iâ€™m a bigger girl, but I carry my weight mainly in the boobs and belly. Iâ€™ve got that mommy apron belly/muffin top and the design of the dress covered it up well. I was surprised. I ordered this dress in a XL and a XXL. I normally wear a XXL and it fit like a glove. So I know the XL wouldnâ€™t have fit at all. Iâ€™d say itâ€™s true to size. It made my shape look nice especially in the tummy area. Iâ€™m wearing this for a photo shoot and am so excited now because Iâ€™ll feel so confident in this dress. The material is nice and silky. Hubby LOVED it. Good job Amazon. I was scared ðŸ˜‚ only gave it a 4 because the sleeves are weird at the end lol Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Red Christmas dress
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Very beautiful dress. Im tall so I was very comfortable with the length. I took holiday pictures with my family and the pictures came out beautifully. Dress has no smell, fabric is not itchy on my skin. Fabric weight is very light but still classy and not see through. Very nice cut . Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Elastic cuff shows
items.body: The elastic cuff at the bottom of the sleeve looked cheap. Also, The dress is too long for 5'4 unless you want it past your knees a bit. The color was great and material fine, but not worth altering. Read more
items.author: Mel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Item as pictured
items.body: Item as pictured & very flattering design. Has decent stretch - currently pregnant & sized up by one size & dress fits perfectly! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 453red, Purple Semi Formal Dress, 453lightpurple, 453purplegrey, Black453, 453rosybrown, Ruffle Elegant Rose Dress, 453indigoblue, 453sesblue, White Cocktail Dress, 453yellow, Darkred Semi Fancy Formal Dress, Green453, Grey453. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
